1.title: Beers & Bikes

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The Boys chart a beerlicious bike route in Niagara On The Lake - profiling beer with celebrity personalities, chatting up brewmasters and dabbling in fine cuisine more sophisticated than they are.

2.title: Paddles, Poses and Pints

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The Boys dive into the beach culture of Port Dalhousie- drinking the beers of Lock Street Brewery, partaking in a beer yoga class and paddle boarding on Lake Ontario...Only one of which they are relatively good at.

3.title: The Art of the Flight

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: The Boys delve into the art of craft beer flights at the oldest craft brewery in St. Catharines, The Merchant Ale House, and contend with a waiter who steals their delectable vegan donuts.

4.title: Albino Rhino Beer Festival

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: The Boys attend a rowdy congregation of Ontario's finest craft breweries in Ridgeway, Ontario, known as the Albino Rhino Beer Festival. With funds going to Ronald McDonald's Children House beer drinking has never served a higher purpose. It's a day of dynamite beers, food trucks and community celebration.

5.title: Ales & Axes

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The Boys experience the creativity of flavours of beer and sausage from Merit Brewing in Hamilton, Ontario, before immersing themselves in an embarrassing competitive axe throwing contest.

6.title: Brew U! Brewery: Kame & Kettle

episode of.title: Tales from the Ale Trail (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: The Boys attempt to brew their own beer under the sage wisdom of Kame and Kettle Beer Works in Fonthill, while acquainting themselves with the brewery's beer and history. They spend more time worrying about what to name the beer than the creating the beer itself.

imdb.plot outline: Three life long friends, Chris, Drew and Nick, who have an affinity for all things delicious, travel to different breweries and immerse themselves in the surrounding culture leaving you salivating at the chance of try the beers and itching to travel Southern Ontario.
imdb.title: Tales from the Ale Trail
plot: Tales From The Ale Trail is a high-energy, hilarious, hop-filled adventure centered around the mouth watering craft beer world in Niagara and Hamilton.::Nick Mirka

Three life long friends, Chris, Drew and Nick, who have an affinity for all things delicious, travel to different breweries and immerse themselves in the surrounding culture leaving you salivating at the chance of try the beers and itching to travel Southern Ontario.::Nick Mirka
